headline: NFL kicks off big season for sports bets. Fanatics exec weighs in.
summary: The 2025 NFL season officially kicks off Thursday night with the Dallas Cowboys paired up to play the Philadelphia Eagles. This presents a fresh opportunity for sports betting companies to gain some yardage this quarter. Fanatics Betting and Gaming CEO Matt King speaks with Asking for a Trend's Josh Lipton to speak on his platform's sports betting features and what sports betting competitors can anticipate in the coming football months. Catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with DraftKings (DKNG) CEO Jason Robins from August. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
